message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CR 

The paper focuses on person Re-Identification (Re-ID) using deep neural networks and proposes a Global-Local-Alignment Descriptor (GLAD) for generating a discriminative and robust representation of human body. This work also proposes an efficient indexing and retrieval framework to accelerate the online Re-ID procedure. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). Other likely sub-categories include cs.MM (Multimedia), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), and cs.CR (Cryptography and Security).
